info.name: local twonky server - black and video fullsize
info.description: On my network attached storage (nas) is a TwonkyServer Media Browser Installed (version 6.0.37). I can access it through my web browser on http://192.168.2.100:9001. this style reformat it to an black background. beside this, it shows the video in maximum availabe size in your browser. if you have any problems just let me know. for e.g. other browser urls, left style reformats cause of another version.
info.additionalInfo: Change Log 2018-01-09 - just updated the licence to "no redistribution" 2017-02-20 added correction for single hr. that just looked like a 1 x 1 pixel tracking image. 2017-01-11 style created screenshot added tested in google chrome Version 55.0.2883.87 m To Do Cross Browser Tests
